amendment.description: Amendment allows the the President to waive any of the sanctions imposed on Sudan contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 3 in part 2 of House Report 105-534, to permit the president to waive any of the Sudan sanctions outlined in the bill if he determines that the national security interest of the U.S. justifies such a waiver.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
